product_name: Chaco Locavore EcoTread Sandals - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built for enjoying a walk outside or strolling along the sand, the Chaco Locavore EcoTread sandals deliver simple style and durable construction to keep your feet comfortable all day long. Luxuriously soft, supple full-grain leather uppers provide a durable, comfortable fit. Calfskin linings and full-grain leather topsoles help manage moisture and naturally deter odors. LUVSEAT(TM) X02 platform features thin-profile polyurethane midsoles, which provide superior arch support for all-day wear. 25% recycled rubber outsoles on the Chaco Locavore EcoTread sandals offer nonmarking traction on wet and dry land. Closeout.
short_description: Built for enjoying a walk outside or strolling along the sand, the Chaco Locavore EcoTread sandals deliver simple style and durable construction to keep your feet comfortable all day long.
